shipText:
Benefits Summary
Below is a summary of your plan benefits. For more information, call 1-800-523-5800 (TTY 711), or check your Certificate of Insurance. Your Certificate of Insurance is your insurance contract and provides all of the terms and conditions of your insurance coverage. It includes benefit descriptions, definitions, exclusions and limitations of your coverage.
HOSPITAL STAYS
For stays when surgery is performed, the benefit is $1500 per day (age 50 - 64.) The benefit begins on the second day of a covered hospital stay.
For stays when surgery is not performed, the benefit is $1200 per day (age 50 - 64.) The benefit begins on the second day of a covered hospital stay.
There is a mental health/substance abuse stay benefit of $800 per day (age 50 - 64.) Benefit begins on the second day of a covered hospital stay. There is a maximum of 45 days in a year.
There is a maximum of 365 days per period of hospital stay for all hospital inpatient stays combined. There is a 730-day lifetime maximum for all stays combined.
OUTPATIENT HOSPITAL EMERGENCY ROOM/OBSERVATION ROOM
The benefit is $175 per visit (ages 50 - 64). There is a maximum of 2 visits each year.
OUTPATIENT HOSPITAL BENEFIT
See your Certificate of Insurance for a list of specific hospital outpatient procedures and benefit amounts. Procedures must be done in a hospital or ambulatory surgical center. There is a maximum of $50,000 per calendar year.
INPATIENT/OUTPATIENT SURGERY BENEFIT
See your Certificate of Insurance for a list of surgical procedures and benefit amounts. Surgeries not listed are covered. The maximum benefit payable for a procedure is $10,000; the benefit for a specific procedure may be less. The surgery benefit does not apply to expenses like anesthesia or facility fees.
INPATIENT/OUTPATIENT HEALTH CARE PRACTITIONER VISIT
The benefit is $75 per visit (age 50 - 64.) There is a maximumof 10 visits each calendar year.
RADIOLOGY
See your Certificate of Insurance for a list of radiology procedures and benefit amounts. The maximum benefit payable is $2,700 per procedure.
LABORATORY/PATHOLOGY
See the list of laboratory/pathology services in your Certificate of Insurance for benefit amounts. The maximum benefit payable is $1600 per procedure.
SKILLED NURSING FACILITY STAYS
The benefit is $300 per day, up to 30 days following each hospital stay (age 50 - 64.) Must be within 90 days following a covered hospital stay.
HOME HEALTH CARE
For home health aide, therapist or nurse (RN/LPN) visits, the benefit is $75 per visit, up to 30 days following each hospital stay (age 50 - 64.) Services must be incurred within 90 days following a covered hospital stay. There is a maximum of 1 visit per day.
OUTPATIENT PRESCRIPTION DRUGS
If your plan has a prescription drug benefit, the benefit amount is between $5 and $70, based on the American Hospital Formulary Service class codes (age 50 - 64.) There is a maximum benefit of $2,000 per calendar year.
